channel.title: Moo my Pooer! VERSION 2!

item.title: Moo my Pooer! VERSION 2!
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

Thats bs there were no errors. Except when I editted first post i accidently forgot to copy the var

program MooMyPooer;
var poo: integer;

procedure countdown;
begin
poo :=5;
writeln(‘Thanks for letting me moo your poo!!!’);
wait(2000);
repeat
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Mooing your poo in ’ + inttostr(poo) + ’ seconds!’);
poo :=poo - 1;
wait(1000)
until(poo=0);
cleardebug;
end;

procedure moopoo;
begin
writeln(‘Proceeding to mooing your poo!!!’)
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Moos your poo’);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘That was great!’)
end;

begin
countdown;
moopoo;
end.

Read full topic

item.description:
@M4G3OWNS wrote:

i fixed the errors in his first 1 here is code
procedure countdown;
Var i : Integer;
begin
i :=5;
writeln(‘Thanks for letting me moo your poo!!!’);
wait(2000);
repeat
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Mooing your poo in ’ + inttostr(i) + ’ seconds!’);
i :=i - 1;
wait(1000)
until(i=0);
cleardebug;
end;

procedure moopoo;
begin
writeln(‘Proceeding to mooing your poo!!!’)
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Moos your poo’);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘That was great!’)
end;

begin
countdown;
moopoo;
end.

item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Yeh open notepad… you could do that easily with the use of bitmaps. Use kanes tut to practice.

and i dont know the backspace… the SCAR help is incomplete because of the character list… this is all they have:

Meanings of Key:
0: SHIFT
1: CONTROL
2: ALT
3: LEFT SHIFT
4: LEFT CONTROL
5: LEFT ALT
6: RIGHT SHIFT
7: RIGHT CONTROL
8: RIGHT ALT

item.title: Moo my Pooer! VERSION 2!
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

Heres version 2 of the moo my pooer. Im a little bit more advanced at scripting now. Still learning.

[scar]program MooMyPooer;
var poo: integer;

procedure countdown;
begin
poo :=5;
writeln(‘Thanks for letting me moo your poo!!!’);
wait(2000);
repeat
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Mooing your poo in ’ + inttostr(poo) + ’ seconds!’);
poo :=poo - 1;
wait(1000)
until(poo=0);
cleardebug;
end;

procedure moopoo;
begin
writeln(‘Proceeding to mooing your poo!!!’)
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘Moos your poo’);
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln(‘That was great!’)
end;

begin
countdown;
moopoo;
end. [/scar]

[scar]program H2modmasterandRonhavefucked;
var fastfuckers: integer;

begin

 fastfuckers :=(0);

repeat
fastfuckers :=fastfuckers + (1);
writeln(‘H2modmaster and Ron have fucked ’ + inttostr(fastfuckers) + ’ times!! Z0mg!!!’);
Wait(1)//Thats how long it takes you to fuck rofl
Until(fastfuckers=999)//Won’t take long lol
writeln(‘Damn you are a bunch of horny emo fags!!!’)
end.[/scar]

item.description:
@h2modmaster wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:2, topic:8672”][scar]
Program HitRyeFox2;
Var i : Integer;
Begin
i := 0;
Repeat
i := i + 1;
WriteLn(‘Hit RyeFox2 in the balls ’ + IntToStr(i) + ’ times.’);
Until(False);
End;
[/scar][/quote]
hehe
[scar]
program LOL;
var m:integer;
begin
cleardebug;
m:=2;
writeln(‘Ron is ’ + inttostr(m) + ’ times better than ryefox2…’);
m:=m + 1;
wait(2000);
repeat
writeln(‘No… I lied… Ron is ’ + inttostr(m) + ’ times better than ryefox2…’);
m:=m + 1;
wait(2000);
until(m=21);
writeln(‘Awww **** it, I’‘ll get right to the point…’);
wait(3000);
writeln(‘Ron is infinity times infinity times infinity(and so on)’)
writeln(‘times better than ryefox2’);
wait(5000);
writeln(’.,l,.(-.-).,l,.’);
wait(2000);
writeln(‘About that ^^^^’);
wait(5000);
writeln(‘No offense to anyone, it’‘s just my signature thingy.’)
end.
[/scar]

[size=10pt]W00t!!! FIRST POSTZORZ![/size]

item.title: Moo my Pooer! VERSION 2!
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

Version 2 yay lol.

procedure countdown;
begin
poo :=5;
writeln('Thanks for letting me moo your poo!!!');
wait(2000);
repeat
cleardebug;
writeln('Mooing your poo in ' + inttostr(poo) + ' seconds!');
poo :=poo - 1;
wait(1000)
until(poo=0);
cleardebug;
end;
 
procedure moopoo;
begin
writeln('Proceeding to mooing your poo!!!')
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln('*Moos your poo*');
wait(2000)
cleardebug;
writeln('That was great!')
end;
 
begin
countdown;
moopoo;
end.

Any tips on my improving my scripts?
